title.rendered: His Excellency Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) declared open the Training Workshop organized for Directors and Desk Officers of the Ministry and its Parastatals

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, His Excellency Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) in the company of the Permanent Secretary, MFA, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa, declared open the Training Workshop organized for Directors and Desk Officers of the Ministry and its Parastatals on Monday, 12th February, 2024.
The training centred on the Presidential deliverables and Priority Areas assigned to the Ministry to accomplish under the current Administration of President Bola Ahmed Tinubu (GCFR) in line with the Renewed Hope Manifesto.
The Workshop was aimed at equipping the aforementioned target audience with the requisite skills and knowledge to effectively deliver on the Presidential Mandate. The Resource Persons included Mr. Esege E. Osege, Mr. Uyi Osagie (both from the Central Delivery Coordination Unit – CDCU), and Mr. Babatunde Rosanwo, HMFA’s Technical Officer.
